dct_description_sm: ontworpen door W. A. Bachiene ; uitgegeven by Nicol. Goetzee ; J. van Jagen sculptur.
Bar scale note: "Schaal van drie Stadien ... "
Upper right margin: "Deze kaart in den Bybel te plaatsen by Luk."
Shows topography, drainage, fountains, travel routes, settlements, places of historical interest.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
